original_text: We have already said this, but now I will say it again. Do not accept any message that is different from the message that we taught you. If anyone teaches a different message, I pray that God will curse him very strongly.
korean_text: 우리가 전에 말하였거니와 내가 지금 다시 말하노니 만일 누구든지 너희가 받은 것 외에 다른 복음을 전하면 저주를 받을지어다

sentences.original_text: but now I will say it again
that is different from the message
If anyone teaches a different message
I pray that God will curse him very strongly
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그를 매우 강하게 저주하시기를 기도합니다
